Re MAP Consideration Cc Marcus Thank you for the EnronMG group structure charts They appear to be preacquisition What we need to include in ETS risk assessment filing is an org chart which shows where ETS fits in the Enron org chart Regards Paul Paul J Pantano Jr McDermott Will Emery th Street NW Washington DC Ph Fax Email This message is a PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL communication If you are not the intended recipient please do not read copy or use it and do not disclose it to others on AM To cc Subject MAP Consideration Paul Further to our conversation on the telephone earlier this week attached is the information you require If there is any further information please you need please do not hesitate to contact me Regards Marcus See attached file Press article FTdocSee attached file structure detailppt See attached file Press article FTdoc See attached file structure detailppt Press article FTdoc structure detailppt
